name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a proficient Data Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in data modeling, ETL design, and performance optimization using the **AWS** stack, including **AWS Glue**, **AWS S3**, **AWS Lake Formation**, **AWS Athena**, **AWS Redshift**, and **AWS Aurora**. My expertise in troubleshooting **AWS** services and implementing encryption protocols ensures the security and integrity of data processing workflows. I have a solid foundation in project management, enhancing team communication, and delivering high-quality solutions aligned with business objectives.
In addition to my technical skills, I am a seasoned Full Stack Developer, leveraging technologies such as **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. My background includes designing enterprise-grade applications that incorporate AI/ML functionalities for advanced analytics and seamless real-time data processing. My hands-on experience in CI/CD automation, microservices architecture, and MLOps workflows with tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** further enhances my ability to deliver comprehensive data solutions.
